mapper.select: SELECT board.*, user.NAME AS WRITER_NAME, attach_file.FILE_SIZE AS FILE_SIZE FROM board LEFT JOIN attach_file ON(CONCAT('board/', BOARD.NUM) = ATTACH_FILE.GLOBAL_CODE AND ATTACH_FILE.DEL_YN = 'N') LEFT JOIN user ON (board.WRITER_ID = user.ID AND user.DEL_YN = 'N') WHERE CATEGORY = #{cat} AND board.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY board.REG_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(NUM, CATEGORY, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER_ID) VALUES(#{num}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writerId})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET VIEW_CNT = VIEW_CNT + 1 WHERE NUM = #{num}
mapper.select: SELECT board.*, user.NAME AS WRITER_NAME FROM board LEFT JOIN user ON (board.WRITER_ID = user.ID AND user.DEL_YN = 'N') WHERE NUM = #{num}
SELECT reply.*, user.NAME AS WRITER_NAME FROM reply LEFT JOIN user ON (reply.WRITER_ID = user.ID AND user.DEL_YN = 'N') WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum} AND reply.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply(BOARD_NUM, CONTENT, WRITER_ID) VALUES(#{boardNum}, #{content}, #{writerId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board WHERE NUM < #{num} AND CATEGORY = #{category} ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 1

UPDATE board SET DEL_YN = 'Y', UPD_DATE = SYSDATE() WHERE NUM = #{num}
UPDATE board SET LIKE_CNT = LIKE_CNT + 1 WHERE NUM = #{boardNum}
UPDATE board SET LIKE_CNT = LIKE_CNT - 1 WHERE NUM = #{boardNum}
mapper.select: SELECT LIKE_CNT FROM board WHERE NUM = #{boardNum}

SELECT B.*, U.NAME AS WRITER_NAME, AF.FILE_SIZE AS FILE_SIZE FROM board B LEFT JOIN attach_file AF ON(CONCAT('board/', B.NUM) = AF.GLOBAL_CODE AND AF.DEL_YN = 'N') LEFT JOIN user U ON (B.WRITER_ID = U.ID AND U.DEL_YN = 'N') WHERE CATEGORY = #{cat} AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.NUM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{num}, '%') AND B.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') AND B.REG_DATE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{regDate}, '%') AND (SELECT NAME FROM USER WHERE B.WRITER_ID = USER.ID) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{writerName}, '%') AND B.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%') ORDER BY B.REG_DATE DESC
